# flrpkgTools

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `flrpkgTools` is to provide custom functions and objects for general use by Ephel.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `flrpkgTools` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
# pak::pkg_install("https://github.com/FrankLef/flrpkgTools.git")
```
